insert.if: insert into qnaBoard (user_no, subject, content) value (#{userNo}, #{subject}, #{content});
insert into qnaBoard (user_no, subject, content, secret) value (#{userNo}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{secret});

mapper.select: select article_no, user.user_no, user_name, subject, content, readcount, register_time, modified_time, secret from qnaBoard join user on qnaBoard.user_no = user.user_no where article_no = #{articleNo};
